note:
Just a girl with deep wonder for the world. My interests and values are all rooted in empathy. Not much of a theorist, but I am a vegan anarchist and a climate activist, with a special interest in preserving biodiversity.

I boost a lot. I'm creating this account to share more of my own life, thoughts, and reads, but I mostly enjoy boosting the insights and beauty that others share here.

I love all animals but might be a *little* partial to cats.

fields.name: profile pic
fields.value: blurry photo of a white woman with blonde hair and a light purple raincoat crouching on roots between two huge redwood trees. The roots and both trees are larger than her crouched figure. She grins at the canopy above.

fields.name: header pic
fields.value: overlooking a hilly coast, in Point Lobos State Natural Reserve. Calm waves break against the smooth rocks, and a green meadow, a dense forest, and mountains are visible in the background.
